name: Halloween Cat Monster Run
description:
Run, dodge, jump, and slide into an incredible Halloween adventure.
Leo Catomy is a brave and spiteful cat that as the habit of getting himself in trouble. Your task will be to make him escape from the angry demon dog.
Rush through crowded ghost towns, small villages, over big bridges and gather all the coins you can. 
While running, avoid hitting trucks, cars, dangerous dragons and the bloody goat or any other object that could either slow you down or stop you. Collect all the fun power ups to get further and to give the tireless devil’s dog the slip.

Halloween Cat Monster Run is one of the 841 best free 3D running games! If you love running games, hallowen games, cat games, funny games or cat simulator games then you will love the free and cool Halloween Cat Monster Run game. Try it out and download Halloween Cat Monster Run now!

How to play:
- Drag/swipe to jump or slide/sub and to move left or right
- The power ups are activated automatically when you get them
- Buy new characters and upgrade power ups with the collected coins
- Try to dash so fast that you can smash the sonic wall ;-)
- Play with your friends and see who can survive this never stop running game.

Features:
- 9 Lovely cats to choose.
- 2 run play mode: levels and infinite
- Cartoon like environment with Leo Catomy
- Amazing power-ups: coin magnet, rocket, super go cart, etc.
- Trucks, cars and buses to avoid!
- Lots of obstacles to dodge
- Cool music

Fun things:
- Kick the ball or chicken and see what happens.
- Fantastic virtual animal run world
- Take care of your cat pet and extend his power or customize everything

Special power- ups
- The rocket will make you fly at top speed over the obstacles and give you the opportunity to collect a lot of coins.
- The Go kart will makes you faster which will require all of your dodging abilities to not crush against something. If you hit something with the kart you will only lose the vehicle but still keep running.


If you like Halloween Cat Monster Run, please rate Leo Catomy with 5 stars on the store and invite your friends on facebook or google plus to join the race.

If you search for funny cat games for girls, crazy cat games for boys or best cat games for kids then Halloween Cat Monster Run is the right game for you! Download it now and have a lot of fun!
